eras.name: Ancient Era
eras.description: The dawn of civilization, marked by the development of agriculture and basic technologies.

eras.name: Classical Era
eras.description: The rise of empires and the development of philosophy, arts, and advanced warfare.

eras.name: Medieval Era
eras.description: A time of castles, knights, and the spread of organized religion.

eras.name: Renaissance Era
eras.description: A period of cultural rebirth and scientific discovery, bridging the medieval and modern worlds.

eras.name: Industrial Era
eras.description: The age of machines, factories, and rapid technological advancement.

eras.name: Modern Era
eras.description: An era marked by global conflicts, technological innovation, and societal change.

eras.name: Atomic Era
eras.description: The age of nuclear power and the space race, shaping the world with new possibilities and dangers.

eras.name: Information Era
eras.description: The digital age, characterized by global communication and rapid information access.

eras.name: Future Era
eras.description: An era of transhumanism, interstellar travel, and the potential for technological singularity.
